eu.sydisnet.blog.samples.deltaspike.cdi12.boundary

Class SingletonHelloService

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.sydisnet.blog.samples.deltaspike.cdi12.boundary.SingletonHelloService
  • Deprecated. 
    This component is never loaded from CDI 1.2 if bean-discovery-mode="annotated" in META-INF/beans.xml

    @Singleton
public class SingletonHelloService
extends Object
    Component whose responsibility is to send to the client a welcome message.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    sydisnet
